course_title: Introduction to Global Trade and Finance
course_description: Knowledge of basic economic concepts and graphical analysis is crucial for success in this course. The course is an introduction to international economics and will cover topics in trade theory, trade policy, and international finance.
prerequisites: This course mandates Econ_OX 101 or Econ_OX 112 as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3814, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: J. Ninkovic, Status: Open
